item.title: [317] making a new server from blank. I got a globalobj error?
item.dc:creator: @Skillapwnz Skillapwnz
item.description:
@Skillapwnz wrote:

Hey people i had a blank source pretty much and i was adding the makeglobal obj system in the character files. this is what i put. cause this is what was in my other sources.

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}} public void NewObjects(){ (objects go here)

and well i got this error.

client.java:63: cannot find symbol symbol : method createNewTileObject(int,int,int,int,int) location: class client person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}} ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

help pls??? cuz i really wanna start from a blank source, and i kinda need this lol.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] making a new server from blank. I got a globalobj error?
